section.heading: Certain land granted for colored schools to revert to United States.

annoGroup.heading: Prior Codifications
annoGroup.annotation: Temporary Repeal of Section Section 2 of D.C. Law 13-220 repealed this section.
Section 4(b) of D.C. Law 13-220 provided that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 2 of the Lovejoy School new Housing and Economic Development Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-461, November 7, 2000, 47 DCR 9440).
